segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is being, just standing there while the water spills everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she’s not even paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to hurt himself on that stool, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined if someone doesn’t turn off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s being completely irresponsible right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and no one is supervising them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s acting like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and that stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she even cares about the mess she’s making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is just chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
